website_summaries.verdict: This tiny classic looking countertop washer is tough, durable, and feature-rich.
pros: Has a durable stainless steel interior, and boasts useful features like a delayed start and automatic detergent and rinse agent dispensers
Comes with a universal adapter for connecting it to a sink faucet
cons: Some users desired more interior room for their dishes
May need an additional adaptor to fit modern faucet heads

customer_reviews.title: Economic on the budget and washes great
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my dishwasher, I have been wanting one so badly but I don’t have space to put a built in one and the roll around ones are more expensive than the built ins so I opted for a counter top which fits perfectly on my tiny counter. It does a great job and I have used it a lot since getting it a week ago. Great investment for myself 💕 I added photo of the washer so you can see what size it is and the inside to show how much you can load in it.
customer_reviews.author: Slavannah

customer_reviews.title: First review ?
customer_reviews.text: While it is Clearly Too soon to judge (it's) Reliability, cleaning is excellent. (This was My biggest fear in trying a countertop unit). This unit employs electronic controls entirely, so there's less risk of mechanical breakdown. IF I had any issues-@ this time, it would be wash time- Takes 130 min. to complete cycle, BUT has a timer delay, so you could set it up to run @ any time, as convenient.
customer_reviews.author: treehed

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you’ll like it.
customer_reviews.text: I had an Artic King before, and left it when we sold the house. Bought this one, based on reviews. The configuration of the tray inside makes all the difference. Most people. In small households with run a large dishwasher with a partial load, or let them sit until the machine is full - not particularly hygienic. With a counter top, one can clear up daily dishes, with only the odd time when a second wash is necessary - as when doing lots of baking, etc. This machine is quiet,several nights I have gotten up to check that I actually turned it on, it was so quiet. B,it, you’ll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Lucille S Craig

customer_reviews.title: It's important not to buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This does NOT clean at all. I put glass lids in and some other things. After three full heavy-duty cycles which took almost six hours, they were still dirty. The water pressure is weak at best. It's like a 25-cent water gun. Seriously!! I don't make this up. The water doesn't heat up and worst of all, it doesn't clean. What's the use of having a dishwasher when you have to clean the dishes before you put them in the dishwasher? You might as well as finish cleaning them yourself and not pay money for this!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for money, works well
customer_reviews.text: First apartment in 10 years w/o a dishwasher. This unit seemed like a good idea. Came well packaged, no damage, was easy to assemble and not too heavy to lift onto counter. Only used it 3 times so far but love it. Great for one person and cats :) A bit noisy if you are turned off by that dishes are just as clean as any other machine I have used. Definitely would buy again and recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: I live alone and I love this dishwasher. It's big enough for me to use for about five days if I'm not cooking and to fit everything if I am cooking. I use the speedier setting that washes them in 45 minutes and it almost always works. Occasionally I'll still have soap suds, in which case I run a rinse. The combined time is still less than a standard load. This does have a very high-pitched house when it runs. I don't seem to notice but I have friends ask about when it's in when they're over. I couldn't be happier with this purchase. It's changed my least favorite thing about my home.
customer_reviews.author: Shushannah Akin

customer_reviews.title: BOUGHT IN MARCH 2019 - ALREADY BROKEN BY SEPTEMBER 2019
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother to help her with housework because had a stroke, she fell, had broken bones in her foot, and it's already broken. Thought I was doing something getting Assurant, and of course...LIKE I THOUGHT...they were no help either. I am so SICK of scams!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little diswasher
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about this sort of tiny dishwasher. I bought it for my daughter's apartment and it is working very well. She is happy about it and so far it isn't leaky or otherwise a problem in how it operates. It really is an excellent way to avoid the drudgery of dishwashing by hand in a small apartment. I would recommend it without reservation at this point.
customer_reviews.author: D.R. of IL

customer_reviews.title: Machine stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Machine does a great job, easy to use and is relatively quiet. I run it about two times a week. However, the machine stopped working after just three months. SPT customer service responses to the problem were not helpful. Am planning to send it back if the problem cannot be solved.
customer_reviews.author: makalaniike

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance for a great price
customer_reviews.text: It's just me and my six year old here so I found this dishwasher perfect for our very small kitchen. I normally would rinse dishes clean and let them sit in the rinse sink until I got around to giving them an official wash in a sink with dish soap. Now I rinse dishes and put them in the dishwasher until it's full then fire it up. It sits where the dish strainer always sat so I really didn't lose any space. The quick connect hose is very convenient. It's been great having this in my home and I would recommend it for couples with one or two children tops.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great for apts
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long it will last but so far so good. Really helpful for those everyday dishes if you can't have a full dishwasher. Although the measurements are correct, you should measure your space before you buy because you may be surprised by the size of the device.
customer_reviews.author: Al Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Do. NOT. Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Too small to be useful. Dishes must practically have to already be clean. Does not rinse well, yet uses a lot of water, electricity, and time. I have tried to find a positive angle with this machine but came up with nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I was looking for! I live by myself in a divided studio (big bedroom/living area, very small kitchen), and I was worried even a smaller dishwasher would take up too much space. This fits perfectly on my countertop, has room for all my dishes, and gets them super clean, even cleaner than I do by hand! All the attachments were included and everything fits just fine. I was worried considering the very few negative reviews I saw, but upon further inspection you'll notice they're all pretty much operator error and should mostly be disregarded. Would purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: Constance Barker

customer_reviews.title: Best portable dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for a small space! I put it on wheels and extended the hoses so I can keep it under a cabinet in the corner and still hook it up and use it easily. There are several settings and they all work well. This is the second one I’ve bought. The first was for coffee cups at work and it has been running without a problem for over five years.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great countertop dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: I have always washed all the crud off dishes before I put them in a dishwasher. I live in an apartment and have gone without a dishwasher for many years now. But my nephew recommended this for me. I absolutely love it! It fits nicely on my cupboard next to the sink. I am completely amazed at how clean my dishes come out...WITHOUT PREWASHING THEM! I have back problems and not having to bend over to empty the dishwasher is really a lifesaver. This was one of the least expensive dishwashers I could find, but don’t let the price fool you. It is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Carol E Maetche

customer_reviews.title: This thing  has worked great for almost 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy this thing has lasted. I have done countless cycles and not a single issue. Its almost crazy. Now I probably jinxed the whole thing. Anyway, this cleans the bejeezus out of your dishes. Need a countertop dishwasher? Here's the model for you.
customer_reviews.author: David Boettin

customer_reviews.title: second one is great
customer_reviews.text: First one did not work correctly, but customer service took care of me. sent me a new one and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Boas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cleans better than any fixed-position dishwasher's i have owned. Perfect for living the #rentlife
customer_reviews.author: r k

customer_reviews.title: I love it love it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Quiet machine, works great! Gets stuff clean and sanitized. Fits well. Easy to assemble. Great size for me, husband, and two kids (dishes include bottles and baby stuff) Not the best for long thermoses or really big long cups bc it hasn't washed the deep inside/bottoms very well.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: It came dented.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good dishwasher. But i received it dented. I didnt return it because I really needed it for my business. But it works fine
customer_reviews.author: Shanara

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick considering the covid and riots. The first came broken but was returned free and replaced. Has worked well so far. we are a larger family but in a smaller space. We use it 2 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah.

customer_reviews.title: It just plain works.
customer_reviews.text: It just does what it is supposed to and it does it well! I have no complaints at all. It installed very easily with no problems at all. The instructions where easy to follow and was done in just a few minutes. READ THE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE YOU TRY TO INSTALL/ SET UP. Those that had a hard time with installation obviously did NOT read the manual BEFORE THEY TRIED TO INSTALL THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney R Davis

customer_reviews.title: The best dishwasher a gal could ask for!
customer_reviews.text: It came safely packaged, all working parts, SUPER easy to install, great with water pressure, super easy to manage, and can handle a great amount of dishes! Did I mention it's incredibly quiet? I live in a studio apartment and I don't notice it at all unless the used water spits out the bottom pipe into the sink (it's supposed to do that btw)! I also bout the 5 year warranty which I suggest because it's only $65 and covers so much!! (It's an option when you add this to you cart) it also fits on my counter perfectly! I'm so in love! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Satberry

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is perfect for a household of 2. It's quiet, easy to maneuver (we have ours on a rolling cart), and does a fantastic job.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi SinClair

customer_reviews.title: Love this dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher has been a wonderful addition to our small house. We have no room for a built-in and a rolling washer would just take up a lot of space. I gladly sacrificed counter space for this machine. You can fit a surprising amount of dishes in this machine and it uses much less water per load than washing by hand. I would absolutely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Works well, is quiet, and very efficient. Easy to instal. Love it already. Highly recommended for anyone with a small kitchen. Larger than a microwave, but light and easy to move so I can use the counter. A little confusing on the delay feature instructions and too much packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Roehling

customer_reviews.title: It DOES heat the water
customer_reviews.text: It does heat the water in the wash cycle, not sure about the prewash.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: takes up a lot of space and doesn't fit ANY faucet.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because it didn't work with our faucet and took too much space. only recieved a partial refund even though the ad says works on any faucet. That's a lie.
customer_reviews.author: M. diaz-ramirez

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy about this small dishwasher..
customer_reviews.text: The first machine was blown and broken and the company sent the new one in a week ,without taking the old machine.. The new machine is very quiet and clean .I'm returning my old machine now...I'm very happy about this small dishwasher..
customer_reviews.author: Sevgi

customer_reviews.title: does not work with a pull out faucet. This is not mentioned in their ad.Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: the hookup adapter is cheap and only fits the older standard faucets and none of the more often used pull down or commercial type faucets that are desirable today. There is no mention of this on their Amazon ad and no quick connect adapters are available on Amazon to correct this. I am very disappointed with their product even though I haven't even used it yet. I am forced to replumb the entire kitchen water system to accommodate their shortcomings. Total waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: No complaints at all - inexpensive and does a good job
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely happy with this purchase! When you pack the machine well, you can actually fit a lot of stuff in it, and it's very simple to use and everything always comes out very clean. I use Cascade pods with mine and it works great. It fits on my counter and has a few inches clearance between its roof and the cabinets above.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great!
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher cleans the dishes as well as a regular sized one! I am very pleased with it. Fits right on my counter and is not very loud when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Great rating, great price, phenomenal shipping. Idoit proof setup.... Absolutley love the operation and cleanliness of my dishes. I rent a older home with no DW, perfect option.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, super quiet, and did great with stuck on food on the shortest cycle (45 minutes)....
